# reload()

**Instance Method**

Reloads the current webpage.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func reload() -> WKNavigation?
```

## Return Value

A new navigation object to represent the reload operation.

## Managing the loading process

- **reload(_:)**: Reloads the current webpage.
- **reloadFromOrigin()**: Reloads the current webpage, and performs end-to-end revalidation of the content using cache-validating conditionals, if possible.
- **reloadFromOrigin(_:)**: Reloads the current webpage, and performs end-to-end revalidation of the content using cache-validating conditionals, if possible.
- **stopLoading()**: Stops loading all resources on the current page.
- **stopLoading(_:)**: Stops loading all resources on the current page.
